original_title: Las superamigas contra el profesor Vinilo
overview: A meteorite that falls into the sewage treatment plant gives powers to 3 young people who are in the institute and turns them into THE SUPER FRIENDS. Together in this adventure they will face the evil Professor Vinyl, a supervillain DJ who is making all the vinyl records in the city disappear and forcing the whole world to listen only to his disco music.
title: The Super Friends versus Professor Vinyl
